select count(a.id)
from tbl_activity a
join tbl_user b
on a.owner = b.id
a.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and b.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and a.startDate > #{startDate}
and a.endDate < #{endDate}

select a.id, b.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createBy, a.createTime, a.editBy, a.editTime
from tbl_activity a
join tbl_user b
on a.owner = b.id
where a.id= #{id}
